name: Large Language Models as Myth-Making Machines
description: This session will present our learnings from using ChatGPT to auto-generate lore in Network States, an onchain strategy game where game events drive a narrative engine generating the lore and history of each state.

speakers.name: 0xhank
speakers.bio: 0xhank is a developer building Primodium, a factory building and interplanetary conquest game. He is also exploring the overlap of LLMs and Autonomous Worlds.

speakers.name: ARB
speakers.bio: ARB is the co-founder of Moving Castles, a game design studio researching and developing Autonomous Worlds. He is working on the games This Cursed Machine and Network States.
